radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomographic (CT) scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Concentric thickening of the wall of the cecum and proximal ascending colon, with fat stranding and prominent lymph nodes in the adjacent mesentery.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Concentric thickening of the colon from the cecum to the hepatic flexure, with adjacent fat stranding.
No abnormalities; mucosa of the hepatic flexure and right side of the colon was purple.
